dcterms:description: ETHG dataset contains an account list that includes 1660 phisher accounts and 1700 non-phisher accounts with their 2-hop transaction records in Ethereum. It is used for analyzing transaction patterns and account behavior.
dcterms:title: ETHG

dcterms:creator: Yuheng Huang

dcterms:description: EOSG dataset integrates and models the on-chain data of EOSIO, including transactions between accounts, account creation data, and smart contract calling data, along with a list of labeled accounts for identity inference.
dcterms:title: EOSG
